chakraData.name: Muladhara
chakraData.location: the base of the spine, the pelvic floor, and the first three vertebrae
chakraData.yoga: Wide-legged forward fold, malasana squats, mountain pose

chakraData.name: Svadhishthana
chakraData.location: above the pubic bone and below the navel
chakraData.yoga: Pigeon pose, goddess pose, warrior II

chakraData.name: Manipura
chakraData.location: from the navel to about the ribcage; associated with all things metabolic, digestive, and stomach-related

chakraData.name: Anahata
chakraData.location: the center of the chest, encapsulating the heart, the thymus gland (which plays a vital role in your endocrine and lymphatic system), the lungs, and the breasts
chakraData.yoga: Back bends, reverse plank, upward-facing dog

chakraData.name: Vishuddha
chakraData.location: your throat; is associated with the thyroid, parathyroid, jaw, neck, mouth, tongue, and larynx
chakraData.yoga: Fish pose, plow pose, shoulder stand

chakraData.name: Ajna
chakraData.location: between the eyebrows; rules organs including the pituitary gland, eyes, head, and lower part of the brain
chakraData.yoga: Child's pose, dolphin pose, eagle pose
